title: FES-UA (Unique Abilities)
description: The Florida Tax Credit Scholarship Program - Unique Abilities (FES-UA) provides scholarships specifically for students with special needs, including autism spectrum disorder, to attend participating private schools or access specialized services. This scholarship helps families cover costs of private school tuition, therapies, and specialized instruction tailored to children with disabilities. FES-UA is particularly valuable for families seeking intensive autism support services or alternative educational settings. Students must have an active Individualized Education Plan or 504 Plan to qualify.

links.label: Step Up For Students FES-UA Program
Florida Department of Education Special Needs Scholarships
